title: Helpdesk Configurator Analyst
content:
Configuration Analyst 
This is an exciting opportunity for a Configuration Analyst at Ivalua. You are involved in the Administration and Configuration Support service of IVALUA solutions (Level 2 Support). You will work on multiple accounts, from different industries to assist our customer’s Administrators.
About Ivalua
Ivalua is developing a new generation of Procurement technology products. “Magic Quadrant” leader, Ivalua’s solutions work in a complex global economy.  Our innovative Procure-to-Pay solutions include automating customized workflows to request, procure, receive, and pay for goods and services across the enterprise, refining the procurement lifecycle while reducing cost and risk of spending on indirect goods, direct goods and services, and improving supplier collaboration.
About the Team
You will be part of the Help Desk and Support Team whose mission is to provide 1st and 2nd level functional and technical support to users and Administrators, help and guide Administrators to successfully deliver enhancements, updates and upgrades of their platform. The Support Team operates with high quality standards and strong commitment to excellence and efficiency. Our customers are mostly from our installed base within the Americas region, as we are part of a larger worldwide support team. We are very customer oriented, team oriented, and take great pride in making sure our customer’s users have a “Best in Class” experience with our platform. 
Key Responsibilities:

You process requests from our customer’s platform administrators or their partners who wish to adapt and configure their solution from the user interface, using all configuration tools available in the platform
You work with international customers mostly from the Americas zone in English.
You are required to discuss with the customer, their needs and the possibilities of implementation and will be responsible for the functional solutions provided.
You may also be required to assist administrators with setting up SQL queries as part of their reporting.
You will benefit from training on our IVALUA Buyer solution leading to Ivalua certification.
You will be trained on our clients' applications to become a functional expert.
Help configure workflows, alerts, reports and more

Skills You Need to Succeed:

3 years’ experience in web-based software development and software configuration
Solid SQL experience is required
Functional knowledge of SRM, Supply Chain, and/or Procurement is a plus
Self-driven, results oriented, autonomous, and strong communication skills
Fluent English spoken and written, French an asset
Some travel may be necessary (occasional) 
Experience in software development, primarily in C#, .NET and SQL Server is a big plus

Shift Times span from 9:00 am to 6:00 am Eastern
The position is based in Montreal, Canada
Preferred Education:
Bachelor’s degree Computer science, or a closely related field or foreign equivalent
 


Check out our video and find out Who We Are! 




Join Ivalua today and procure a great future for your career!

questions.label: This role will require a Hybrid work schedule of 3 days of the week working in the office - Tuesday and Thursday in the office is required with the 3rd day based on Department preference. Are you able to work this Hybrid work schedule?
What is your expected Base Salary (not including bonus) for this position? A narrow range or single number is greatly appreciated.
Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship or a work permit to work legally for our Company?
If YES to requiring sponsorship, what is the basis of the current work authorization AND when does the work authorization expire?
